title.value: Integrating accompanying patients into clinical oncology teams: limiting and facilitating factors
title.justification: The title is explicitly stated at the beginning of the paper.
title.quote: Integrating accompanying patients into clinical oncology teams: limiting and facilitating factors

extractions.description: This research paper explores the factors that influence the integration of accompanying patients (APs) into clinical oncology teams, based on a qualitative study conducted across four establishments in Quebec. It identifies both limiting and facilitating factors in terms of governance, culture, resources, and tools, providing recommendations for successful program implementation.

type.justification: The paper focuses on identifying and analyzing theoretical frameworks and factors affecting the integration of accompanying patients, without presenting new empirical findings or experimental data.
type.quote: We used the framework developed by Pomey et al. [17] based on Parsonsâ€™ model [18] to interpret our results.

name.justification: The paper is focused on healthcare services, specifically the integration of accompanying patients in clinical oncology teams, which is aligned with healthcare services research.
name.quote: This study addresses the inner settings, individuals, and implementation process domains and the related constructs regarding implementation of the PAROLE-Onco program in four institutions.

name.justification: The paper specifically deals with clinical oncology teams and cancer patient experience.
name.quote: The PAROLE-Onco program aims to evaluate the integration of APs as full-fledged members of the clinical oncology teams in a real context.

name.justification: The study focuses on improving the patient care experience through the integration of APs.
name.quote: APs provide emotional, informational, cognitive and navigational support to patients by mobilizing their experiential knowledge.

name.justification: The study employs qualitative research methods, such as semi-structured interviews and focus groups, to gather data on AP integration.
name.quote: A qualitative study based on semi-structured interviews and focus groups was conducted with 20 APs...
